FOUND IN: Static - having no visible movement or change over time.
Tempo - The rate or pace at which a piece of music is played, measured in beats per minute (BPM).
Panthera leo (the scientific name for the species)
Lifting platform (a flat surface on which heavy objects can be raised to higher levels)
Baseplate (in machinery, it can refer to a lower support element that is very close to ground level)
Saucer - A shallow dish for holding a cup.
Cobalt Cyan - Similar to cobalt blue but with a slightly different shade; it's widely used in printing processes for its clean output.
